questions.question: What is the name of the product or system being validated?
questions.description: Used throughout the report to identify the validated system

questions.question: What is the release version being validated?
questions.description: Identifies the specific version covered by this validation

questions.question: What is the validation period (start and end dates)?
questions.description: Shows the timeframe during which validation activities were performed

questions.question: Who prepared this validation summary report?
questions.description: Identifies the team responsible for the report

questions.question: Who approved this validation summary report?
questions.description: Identifies the approver of the report

questions.question: What is the document date?
questions.description: Date when the report was finalized

questions.question: What validation activities were covered in this report?
questions.placeholder: e.g., Installation and configuration verification, Functional testing of implemented features, Operational workflow validation, Integration verification
questions.description: Defines what was included in the validation effort

questions.question: What assumptions apply to this validation?
questions.placeholder: e.g., Testing environments accurately reflect production configurations, Approved requirements and specifications were used as validation references, Test data used represents expected operational scenarios
questions.description: States the assumptions made during validation

questions.question: What acronyms and their definitions should be included in the report?
questions.description: List all acronyms used in the validation report with their definitions

questions.question: What documents were referenced during validation and their versions?
questions.description: List all documents referenced in the validation with their versions

questions.question: What testing environment details should be documented?
questions.description: Describe the testing environment, tools used, and test data

questions.question: What were the Installation Qualification test results?
questions.description: Document each IQ test area with its result and any comments

questions.question: What were the Operational Qualification test results?
questions.description: Document each OQ test area with its result and any comments
